1388.name: Share of Revenue from Income tax (Flora (1983) and ICTD (2016))
1388.datasetName: Revenue shares from tax â€“ Flora (1983) and ICTD (2016)

source.name: Flora (1983) and ICTD (2016)
source.dataPublishedBy: Data up to 1975 from Flora, Peter et al. 1983. State, Economy and Society in Western Europe, 1815-1975. Frankfurt: Campus Verlag. Data after 1975 from International Centre for Tax and Development
source.link: Data from Flora (1983) available from http://gpih.ucdavis.edu/Government.htm Data from ICTD available from http://www.ictd.ac/datasets/the-ictd-government-revenue-dataset
source.additionalInfo: Data from the ICTD corresponds to estimates from OECD. More details in Prichard, W. (2016). Reassessing Tax and Development Research: A New Dataset, New Findings, and Lessons for Research. World Development, 80, 48-60.
